name: flit
description:
Floating-point Litmus Tests (FLiT) is a C++ test infrastructure for
detecting variability in floating-point code caused by variations in
compiler code generation, hardware and execution environments.

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependencies.name: py-pyelftools
dependencies.description:
A pure-Python library for parsing and analyzing ELF files and DWARF
debugging information

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: sqlite
dependencies.description:
SQLite is a C-language library that implements a small, fast, self-
contained, high-reliability, full-featured, SQL database engine.
